content.description: The following question refers to the topic of conservatism in the nineteenth century.
content.question: Which of the following most directly led conservatives to develop a coherent conservative ideology in the early nineteenth century?

choices.label: The desire to move away from traditional religious practices
The need to redefine relationships between landowners and the commercial class
The demands to restrain the excesses of Enlightenment radicalism
The feeling that the status quo of monarchical rule in Europe was unworkable

content.answer: The demands to restrain the excesses of Enlightenment radicalism

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
